title: Showing Legacy Skins
body: When I click on a champion now it shows legacy skins but not that I can buy them, idk if this has been a thing and I've just missed it or what but I'd like to buy some of the older skins but I can't. Do I have to wait or?

replies.body: Legacy skins are not available in stores and may only appear during special events, per the [legacy skins](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins) guide.  Depending on what you're trying to unlock, some legacy skins can be unlocked through mystery gifting or hextech crafting with some luck.  Hope that helps and good luck!
